page.title: 16CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: We play lots of games at Cheswick Green and one of our favourites is called Semi to Semi Speedie.We use a netball pitch to play on and use the two semi-circles at each end of the pitch as the dens.One person is on at the start of the game.All team members start in one semi-circle and everyone has to get to the other semi-circle without being caught by the person who is on.When you are caught you join the person who is on.The game continues until everyone is caught and the winner is the last person to be caught.Each game lasts about five to ten minutes and is lots of fun.
